channel.title: How To Create A Server
channel.description:
Hey guys, its me :D Lil_Smok3r.. Giving One Of My Usual TuTs.. But This One Is About "How To Start A Server" So Just Follow The Steps Below!!
Difficulty: 4/10 Knowledge Needed: Nothing Really..
[size=24pt][font=arial black]Winrar[/font][/size] First Of all.. You Will need Winrar For Extracting Files! Link For Winrar: www.rarlab.com Download It And Then Get Back To Reading This!
[size=24pt][font=arial black]Java[/font][/size]
We Need The Correct Java Now! Link: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk6-downloads-1637591.html [IMG]http://i1249.photobucket.com/albums/hh520/PsycoNoob/JavaShot.jpg[/img] Its Jdk 1.6.0_33... :D
[size=24pt][font=arial black]Setting Up Your Environmental Variables[/font][/size] This Is A Crucial Part Of Making A Server - One Mistake Here = Whole Server = Ruined! A Long Chain o.O First We Open Up Control Panel, Then Click System, And Then, When System Pops Up, Click Advanced System Settings Then You then click "Environment Variables"
You will see this: [img]http://i1249.photobucket.com/albums/hh520/PsycoNoob/Env.png[/img] Now.. Lets Think Of The Top Table as White! So forget its there! Ok? Now click on "Classpath" and click on "Edit" for the Variable Value, take everything out and put this in it: [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_33\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code]
Now for the second one, scroll down until you see "PATH" click on it and Edit it, for Variable Value, put this in it: [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_33\bin;[/code] So Now We Have Finished Setting Up Enviromental Variables! Well Done :L Its Like The 3rd Hardest Part in the Success Of Having a Server!
[size=24pt][font=arial black]Source + Client[/font][/size] So Now We Are On The Last Step! We Have A Download List That Our Very Own Davidi Has Created! The Link Is Here: [font=arial black]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,488887.0.html[/font] So Just Choose A 317.. I recommend InsidiaX or Hybrid PvP :D And Guess What..
[size=12pt]YOU ARE DONE![/size]
[size=24pt][font=arial black]Credits[/font][/size]
So Now Its Golden Time :D If You Disagree, Post Below what you think it should be :D
25% RageZone = Reminded Me Of Which Parts I Forgot To Add 50% Me = Typing This Up, Using Most of My Knowledge and yeah.. 25% Davidi = For Saving Me Trouble with his Download List!(so i didnt have to search the whole of google looking for good sources)
So Now You Are Done With Creating A Server, Putting It Online Is The Hardest Part.. But Not Anymore!!!! I made A TuT On How To Portforward, The Easy Way! Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,555946.msg4070953/boardseen.html#new
Bye Moparians.. More From Me Soon :D
Rep++ Would Be Thankfull.. Not asking but saying.. if you want to :P

item.title: How To Create A Server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hey guys, its me Lil_Smok3r… Giving One Of My Usual TuTs… But This One Is About “How To Start A Server”
So Just Follow The Steps Below!!

Difficulty: 4/10
Knowledge Needed: Nothing Really…

[size=24pt][font=arial black]Winrar[/font][/size]
First Of all… You Will need Winrar For Extracting Files!
Link For Winrar: www.rarlab.com
Download It And Then Get Back To Reading This!

[size=24pt][font=arial black]Java[/font][/size]

We Need The Correct Java Now! Link: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk6-downloads-1637591.html

Its Jdk 1.6.0_33…

[size=24pt][font=arial black]Setting Up Your Environmental Variables[/font][/size]
This Is A Crucial Part Of Making A Server - One Mistake Here = Whole Server = Ruined! A Long Chain o.O
First We Open Up Control Panel, Then Click System, And Then, When System Pops Up, Click Advanced System Settings Then You then click “Environment Variables”

You will see this:

Now… Lets Think Of The Top Table as White! So forget its there! Ok?
Now click on “Classpath” and click on “Edit” for the Variable Value, take everything out and put this in it:

Now for the second one, scroll down until you see “PATH” click on it and Edit it, for Variable Value, put this in it:

So Now We Have Finished Setting Up Enviromental Variables! Well Done :L Its Like The 3rd Hardest Part in the Success Of Having a Server!

[size=24pt][font=arial black]Source + Client[/font][/size]
So Now We Are On The Last Step! We Have A Download List That Our Very Own Davidi Has Created!
The Link Is Here: [font=arial black]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,488887.0.html[/font]
So Just Choose A 317… I recommend InsidiaX or Hybrid PvP And Guess What…

[size=12pt]YOU ARE DONE![/size]

[size=24pt][font=arial black]Credits[/font][/size]

So Now Its Golden Time
If You Disagree, Post Below what you think it should be

25% RageZone = Reminded Me Of Which Parts I Forgot To Add
50% Me = Typing This Up, Using Most of My Knowledge and yeah…
25% Davidi = For Saving Me Trouble with his Download List!(so i didnt have to search the whole of google looking for good sources)

So Now You Are Done With Creating A Server, Putting It Online Is The Hardest Part… But Not Anymore!!!
I made A TuT On How To Portforward, The Easy Way!
Link: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,555946.msg4070953/boardseen.html#new

Bye Moparians… More From Me Soon
